thread.title: 2 officers shot in North Carolina, conditions are unknown,...
thread.title_full: 2 officers shot in North Carolina, conditions are unknown,... | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Alexa Ashwell
title: 2 officers shot in North Carolina, conditions are unknown,...
text:
Two officers are shot in Gaston County and their conditions are unknown, the police chief told our news partners at the Gaston Gazette.
Gaston County Commissioner Chair Tracy Philbeck said Saturday night the two Gaston County officers are alive.
2 Gaston County officers shot tonight. Please keep our officers in your prayers. More info to follow as I know more....
— Tracy Philbeck (@tracyphilbeck) August 9, 2015 WSOC-TV is on-scene working to get more details.
>> Read more trending stories
Breaking: pictures of scene in Gaston Co. As you can see heavy police presence. special units also on scene @wsoctv pic.twitter.com/29MUdHwGrj
— Alexa Ashwell (@AlexaWSOC9) August 9, 2015 Return to this story for updates .
